description:
http: close connection after printing panic stack trace
In a testing situation, it's possible for a local http
server to panic and the test exit without the stack trace
ever being printed.
Fixes issue 2480.

messages.text:
Seems arbitrary / maybe a race in the test, but seems fine.

On Fri, Nov 18, 2011 at 10:48 AM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM
>
> brad?
>

Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f6b994f33cf4 ***

http: close connection after printing panic stack trace
In a testing situation, it's possible for a local http
server to panic and the test exit without the stack trace
ever being printed.
Fixes issue 2480.
